page.title: 06LEISURE AND RECREATION
page.content: were not allowed to go and no volunteer helpers could be found so it closed.Many teenagers now go to the local High School youth club outside the village.We asked the members of these organisations what their favourite activities were.Both boys and girls liked rough games.Their favourite game was cities. In this game you get split into three or four groups and each group takes the name of a city.Then the organizer shouts the names of two cities out.The first city has to attack the second city and take as many people as they can back to their own corner before the organizer shouts. Stop you keep repeating this.Not all children like to join organisations and their favourite pastime is playing on the computers and most liked the tapes- Snooker,Daley Thomson's decathalon,
